doc.title: A Close Encounter with Robbie Williams
doc.plot: Fresh from being crowned as Best Male Performer at the 2005 MTV European Music Awards, Robbie Williams now embarks on his biggest world tour to date. Robbie takes to the stage at Roundhay Park, Leeds, performing to thousands of fans as part of this highly anticipated tour. As well as material from his new multi-million selling album Intensive Care, Robbie will also perform all the old favourites.
